mapper.select:
SELECT bonNum, bonTitle, bonContent, bonReadcount, bonRegdate FROM( SELECT ROWNUM num, bonNum, bonTitle, bonContent, bonReadcount, bonRegdate FROM ( SELECT bonNum, bonTitle, bonContent, bonReadcount, bonRegdate FROM notice
ORDER BY bonRegdate DESC ) ) WHERE num between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
SELECT bonNum, bonTitle, bonContent, bonReadcount, bonRegdate FROM notice WHERE bonNum = #{bonNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice VALUES ( bonNum.nextval, #{bonTitle}, #{bonContent}, 0, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET bonTitle = #{bonTitle}, bonContent = #{bonContent} WHERE bonNum = #{bonNum}
UPDATE notice SET bonReadcount = bonReadcount+1 WHERE bonNum = #{bonNum}
